alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Morgan; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:48PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Morgan, north central Jasper and east central Newton Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 148 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Starrsville, or near Covington, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Covington, Madison, Porterdale, Newborn, Mansfield, Farrar, Starrsville and Brick Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
